user.title: Connect to Homematic IP HCU
user.description: Enter the connection details for your Homematic IP HCU.

auth.title: Authenticate with HCU
auth.description: Please provide the activation key for '{hcu_ip}' from the HCU WebUI > Settings > Connect.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the HCU. Check host and ports.
error.invalid_key: Authentication failed. The activation key may be invalid or expired.

global_settings.title: Global Settings
global_settings.description: Configure global settings and device import filters.

vacation.title: Set Vacation Mode
vacation.description: Activate the time-based vacation mode. This will set all heating groups to the specified temperature until the end time. To deactivate, use the 'hcu_integration.deactivate_absence_mode' service.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the HCU.
error.api_error: An API error occurred while trying to set vacation mode.

play_sound.name: Play Sound
play_sound.description: Plays a sound file on a compatible device (e.g., HmIP-MP3P doorbell, alarm sirens).

sound_file.name: Sound File
sound_file.description: The name of the sound file to play (e.g., 'SOUND_01', 'ALARM_01').

volume.name: Volume
volume.description: The volume level for the sound, from 0.0 to 1.0.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: The duration in seconds for which the sound should play.

set_rule_state.name: Set Rule State
set_rule_state.description: Enables or disables a simple automation rule within the HCU.

rule_id.name: Rule ID
rule_id.description: The unique identifier of the rule to be controlled.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether to enable or disable the rule.

set_display_content.name: Set Display Content
set_display_content.description: Sets the text and icon on an e-paper display of a compatible device (e.g., HmIP-WRCD).

line_1.name: Line 1
line_1.description: The text to display on the first line.

line_2.name: Line 2
line_2.description: The text to display on the second line.

line_3.name: Line 3
line_3.description: The text to display on the third line.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: The name of the icon to display (e.g., 'ICON_SUN', 'ICON_MOON'). See API docs for options.

activate_vacation_mode.name: Activate Vacation Mode
activate_vacation_mode.description: Activates the system-wide vacation mode for all heating groups until a specified time.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: The target temperature for the vacation period.

end_time.name: End Time
end_time.description: The date and time when the vacation mode should end. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM' or any string parsable by Home Assistant.

activate_eco_mode.name: Activate Eco Mode (Permanent Absence)
activate_eco_mode.description: Activates the system-wide permanent absence (Eco) mode for all heating groups.

deactivate_absence_mode.name: Deactivate Absence Mode
deactivate_absence_mode.description: Deactivates any active absence mode (Vacation or Eco) and returns heating to its previous schedule.

activate_party_mode.name: Activate Party Mode
activate_party_mode.description: Activates the party mode for a specific heating group with a specific temperature.

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: The target temperature for the party mode.

end_time.name: End Time
end_time.description: The date and time when the party mode should end (e.g., '2025-12-24 23:00'). Format: 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM' or any string parsable by Home Assistant. Mutually exclusive with duration.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: The duration in seconds for the party mode. Mutually exclusive with end_time.
